name: maxpulse-complete
description: MAXPULSE Platform - Complete Monorepo with Dashboard and Assessment Tool

scripts.build: npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:assessment && npm run copy:builds
scripts.build:dashboard: cd dashboard && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:assessment: cd assessment && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:builds: mkdir -p dist && cp -r dashboard/dist dist/dashboard && cp -r assessment/dist dist/assessment
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd dashboard && npm install && cd ../assessment && npm install
